login.subtitle: Select a login method to access your Pronote account.
login.geolocationDesc: Enable geolocation to find nearby schools
login.searchCityDesc: Search for your city name in the search bar
login.tosAknowledge: By continuing, you accept our {termsOfServiceLink} and our {privacyPolicyLink}.
login.geoSafetyText: In accordance with our {privacyPolicyLink}, your geolocation data is never stored. {lockIcon}
login.noSchoolsFoundMessage: No schools found in this area.
login.cityNotInFranceMessage: This city doesn't seem to be in France...
login.useManualLinkMessage: Use your school's Pronote link to log in.

settings.title: Settings
settings.classRemindersDesc: You will receive reminders before each class of your day.
settings.delayDesc: The delay before you receive these reminders.
settings.homeworkNotDoneDesc: Each evening you will receive a notification if unfinished homework is due for the next day.
settings.packBackpackDesc: Each evening receive a notification to remember to pack your backpack for tomorrow.
settings.toggleTelemetryDesc: Share diagnostic data to help improve the app.
settings.logoutDesc: Signs you out of your Pronot'if account
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Signs you out and deletes your account from our servers. This action is irreversible.
settings.donateDesc: Pronot'if is a non-profit student project. We don't make money from it, so if you like this app, please consider supporting us.
settings.reportBugDesc: Found a bug? Tell us how to fix it.
settings.lunchMenuDesc: You will receive a notification with the lunch menu at lunchtime.
settings.eveningMenuDesc: You will receive a notification with the lunch menu on the evening.
settings.newGradeDesc: Receive a notification when a new grade is published.

dashboard.subtitle: Here's a quick overview of your day.
dashboard.noHomeworksDesc: You don't seem to have any homework for this week.

modal.geoDesc: We use your location only to find nearby schools. Your coordinates are never stored.
modal.geoFootnote: You can always use manual search if you wish to.

notif.title: Notifications
notif.enableDesc: Enable notifications to get the most out of Pronot'if.

schedule.noClassFoundForDate: No classes planned for this day.

toast.logoutConfirmation: ‚ö†Ô∏è Are you sure you want to log out?
toast.deleteAccountConfirmation: ‚ö†Ô∏è Are you sure you want to delete your account ? This action is irreversible.
toast.missingLinkDesc: Please enter the Pronote link of your school.
toast.searchFailedTitle: An error has occured while performing the search.
toast.geolocUnavailableDesc: Geolocation is not available on this device.
toast.geolocRequestRefusedDesc: Please enable geolocation or use manual search.
toast.geolocRequestErrorDesc: Please try again or use manual search.
toast.malformedPronoteLinkTitle: The given Pronote link is not valid.
toast.reportSystemUnavailableDesc: The reporting system is not available.
toast.reportSystemErrorDesc: Failed to open the report form.
toast.nameTooLongErrorDesc: The name must not exceed 50 characters.
toast.deleteAccountSuccessDesc: All your data has been deleted from our servers.
toast.enableNotificationSuccessDesc: You will now receive notifications for your classes and assignments.
toast.iosNotificationsAppRestartMessage: The app will restart to complete the notification activation process.
toast.enableNotificationDeniedDesc: To reactivate them, go to your device settings.
toast.telemetryEnabledDesc: Thanks! Diagnostics will be enabled on next app startup.
toast.telemetryDisabledDesc: Diagnostics will be disabled on next app startup.
toast.errorFetchingScheduleDesc: An error has occured while fetching the timetable data.
toast.partialScheduleDesc: Some schedule data could not be fetched due to an issue. Please try again later.
toast.partialDashboardDesc: Some data could not be fetched due to an issue. Please try again later.
toast.sessionExpiredDesc: You see to have been logged in on another device. Please log in again.
toast.homeworkStatusUpdateFailedDesc: Failed to update homework status. Please check the official Pronote app.
toast.pronoteTimeoutDesc: Your school's Pronote server is not responding. Please try again later.

notification.logoutInfoDesc: To contiue, please login again on your account. This can happen if your password has recently changed or if an unknown error has occured.
notification.cancelledClassBody: The {name} class originally scheduled for {class_start_time} has been canceled.
notification.classTimeRoomMessageDesc: The {name} class will be held in room {room_name} and will start at {class_start_time}. {chosen_emoji}

notification.getBagReadyDesc: It's time to pack your bag for tomorrow!
notification.noUnfinishedHomeworkDesc: You've finished all your homework for tomorrow, you can chill out! üòÆ‚Äçüí®
notification.unfinishedHomeworkDesc: You still have {not_finished_homeworks_count} assignments to complete for tomorrow.
notification.singleUnfinishedHomeworkDesc: You have one assignment left to complete for tomorrow.
